A Simple bookmark Manager

A cleen and simple interface to organize your favirote websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load instantly. Try it for free.

Features

Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to acsess your favorite websites. Your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can access them on the go

Bookmark in one click

Organaize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over hou you manage your fovorite sites.
